com.netflix.governator.guice.concurrent

Class ConcurrentProviders

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.governator.guice.concurrent.ConcurrentProviders

  • public class ConcurrentProviders
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for creating Providers that allow for concurrent instantiation of dependencies to a type.
    Author:
    elandau

      static <T> <any> of(java.lang.Class<? extends T> type)
